features: 【5000mAh Rechargeable Battery】A large capacity of 5000mAh rechargeable battery enables the fan to work for a long time. 3 hours of charging the fan to the full will grant you 3.5-9 hours of coolness depending on different speeds

【Safety Assurance】The bladeless design ensures safe use for the long-haired, children, and the elderly. Adopt an individual charging protection circuit to protect the device from over-charged, over-discharged, over-current, and short circuits, combining the fixed frequency DC-DC, which is to protect the motor from being damaged, ensuring a longer lifespan of the device

【Adjustable Speeds & 3.5-9 Working Hours】One button operation, press to change fan speeds, very easy to use. And the large capacity battery provides a 3.5-9 working hours duration, depending on which wind mode you choose

【Hand-free Design & Angle Adjustable】Its hand-free design is to release your hands. Also, with the soft silicone on the neck part of the fan, you can always adjust the angle of the airflow at will. And the many little air outlets spreading over the fan can give you 360-degree silent wind around your neck and face

【Best Gift Choice】The premium and stylish appearance of the fan makes it ideal for use on many occasions, such as outdoor work, gym, office, mowing lawn, yard work, stroller rides, casual walking, driving, traveling, camping, fishing and more you can imagine. Also the best gift choice for families and friends, just click the Add to Cart button and wait to see their look of surprise

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big help while mowing
reviews.reviewText: I had to try this product. My review is this: Very light weight. Good battery life. Blows a lot of air. Only thing I suggest is to use ear plugs. It's not that loud but does produce an aggravating humming noise right at your ears. Might not bother you if listening to music with ear buds.I live in the South with a lot of humidity. I'm an outside person, mow my yard every week sometimes twice so I wrap a wet hand towel around my neck. I can wear this right over my towel with no problem. Really keeps me cool. It works quite well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve been looking for a neck fan for Disney, and this one is perfect. Great power with three different speeds and holds a charge for most of the day. Flexible, compact and it folds up nicely to carry in a purse. Great value for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these - one for myself and one for my daughter. We both work in an environment with unreliable cooling especially in the stock rooms. My daughter uses yours daily and really likes it. I haven't used mine at work yet but have used it when I was mowing the grass. It definitely provides sufficient airflow to cool you off. I only used it on the lowest speed and that was enough for the over 90deg temps while I was mowing. It was a little heavier than I expected but nothing extreme and it didn't really bother me after a while. It was noisier than I expected but again, I usually wear a headphone when I'm using it so it wasn't that big of a deal. The one thing I really like about the product is that you can adjust the arms. This allowed me to direct the airflow where I wanted. The drawback to that is that there is no airflow on the back of your neck but if you have long hair and leave it down that might be a not good thing anyway. Anyway, I liked this enough that I will be buying them for others I know who work in a hot environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep Humidity at Bay // Recharchable
reviews.reviewText: This fan is LIFE!! I’m not prone to giving false compliments, so believe me when I say you NEED this fan. I’ve bought 3. My husband wears his while cutting the grass or working outside. We live in a southern Hot & Humid area and these are perfect at keeping your body temperature cool in miserable hot conditions. I do sports photography, and I wear mine while standing for hours at a time in the blazing sun taking pictures. Bought one for my sister in law who likes to walk in the park and hike. USB rechargeable . The charge lasts a long time and is so much better than replacing batteries. The quality of construction is there as well. Easy to store in the outside pocket of a backpack. Great gift also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps the team cool
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for my maintenance staff. They love them. Keep them extremely cool on those 104° days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Purchased to help reduce my claustrophobia
reviews.reviewText: Initial Review Jan 13, 2022I've had a form of claustrophobia for over 20 years. For each person with this phobia it can be different. For example I have no problem being in an elevator. For me it's all about being concerned that I won't be able to breathe. I know this is all psychological but there it is and I've not been able to improve on my fear. That is what I bought this neck fan for.I have a specific use in mind. For about a year I've been taking pilot lessons to fly planes. The one I've been training in has some space around me and there is a window I can slide open. No problem for my claustrophobia. But I can't remain confined to just that one airplane. The next airplane I hope to fly is more confining, and there is no window. Just sitting in the driver's seat parked on the ground triggers my phobia and I have to open the door or get out of the airplane. I'm hoping this neck fan will help.If I can feel air blowing around my face I expect I will be much more comfortable. It's worth a try. For that use I have some concerns.1) I hope the fan is not electrically noisy which might cause static sounds in the communication system.2) As I'm not using this to cool off it actually might be too cold. It's winter now and in the 40s to 50s each flight (no heat to speak of in the airplane).All of this will be sorted out in the next few weeks when I'll check it out in a real situation.In the mean time this is a nice looking, if a bit large, neck fan. It is a little adjustable so I can move the air flow closer or further from my face. The design and fabrication is smooth; nothing to cause scratching or discomfort. The lowest setting might be best for me as it stays on for 5 seconds, then off for five seconds. This way it might not be too cold.Of course it may be really appreciated during our hot summers. I'm thinking of wearing it as I do yard work to help keep me cool.Pros:- The design makes it feel comfortable around me neck.- 5 fan speeds- Smooth exterior. No sharp points- Long run timesCons:- I would like it to blow more on my face and less on my neck and cheeks. The fins at the air delivery holes are actually designed to guide air away from the face and more onto the neck.- I was surprised how much noise the fan makes. It's not loud but I expected it to be silent on the lowest setting.- The on/off/speed button is form fitting on the right side. There is no way I can find and push the button because it is so smooth and level with the surface of the fan. It would help if there was a braille type raised dot or two.I will return here to update my review after I try this neck fan in the airplane.

Going through menopause and feeling like I am living in an oven. This is hands-down, the best product I have ever bought to help me with my hot flashes. It’s very comfortable to hang around your neck, it generates a lot of cooling and has three different speeds. It’s not completely silent, I can hear a gentle buzz, but nobody around me has been bothered by it. Charge lasts about 6-8 hours running continuously. Quite honestly, this is the best product that I have purchased on Amazon this year. I couldn’t recommend it more highly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nutze es für die Arbeit aka Zweckentfremdung :)
reviews.reviewText: Mit seinen 5k mAh die mit Usb C Typ C aufgeladen werden kann hat man damit garkeine Probleme an sehr warmen Orten zu Arbeiten denn sie helfen wenn auch nur wenig Hitze erträglicher zu machen denn der Lärme in der Industrie ist lauter als er selbst, daher hört man ihn nie und stört damit auch nie, die Kühlleistung ist ausreichend aber nicht top, für den Preis aber mehr als Top daher verlangt kein Meisterwerk sondern etwas was euch Hilfe wenn mal not am mann ist, klar kann man auch außerhalb nutzen aber->jedem das seine ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent item when having hot flushes

Un prodotto molto valido, l'ideale per contrastare questo caldo afoso🥵Regala una piacevole sensazione di freschezza intorno al collo, spalle e torace.È leggero da indossare, non da fastidio.Anche elegante da vedere, ed è regolabile perché si snoda facilmente e si adatta a qualsiasi tipo di corporatura.Sono completamente soddisfatta 🤗 ci voleva proprio!!!Ne acquisterò sicuramente degli altri da regalare a tutta la mia famiglia 🤩Va caricato con cavetto usb.E si accende con un pulsante posto su un lato della cuffie, ha 3 varianti di potenza per aumentare o diminuire la ventilazione... ci sono le mini luci LED che ve lo faranno capire 😉🔝

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely brilliant!!! 3 speed cooling fan. I use on the lowest & battery lasts all day at work. Recharge it over night with USB (provided)Reduces meno flushes as keeps you cooler constantly. And makes them more bearable with the cooling breeze. Comfy to wear. Light weight. Easy to operate. Game changer.
